From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Sinnertwin narrowly twisted his body sideways to avoid the blast, part
of his metal charring from it. "Ooooooooooh, I like food that fights
back" one of the heads snarled. "Yesss, it more appetizing as it wiggles
down the throat" the other hissed, as they both then kept on decending
towards the ground, and fired a stream of heat each, this time aiming at
the plasma cannon.
